title: Kim Kardashian nearly spills out of black satin dress after admitting she needed SKIMS to look slim
text:
She's her own best advertisement.

And Kim Kardashian enlisted the help of a pair of SKIMS to give her that super slim figure as she stepped out in New York on Thursday afternoon.

The 39-year-old nearly spilled out of the top of her black satin dress as she made her way to an Ulta beauty store in Manhattan.

Sturdy: Kim Kardashian enlisted the help of a pair of SKIMS to give her that super slim figure as she stepped out in New York on Thursday afternoon

Kim's hourglass curves were highlighted underneath the silky garment which featured a sweetheart neckline and long sleeves beginning below her shoulders.

Her show-stopping gown was hemmed just above her ankles to reveal a pair of strappy black stilettos.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wore her chocolate brown hair straight past her shoulders with a distinct part down the middle.

Out and about: The 39-year-old nearly spilled out of the top of her black satin dress as she made her way to an Ulta beauty store in Manhattan

Fashion: Kim's hourglass curves were highlighted underneath the silky garment which featured a sweetheart neckline and long sleeves beginning below her shoulders

City slicker: Her show-stopping gown was hemmed just above her ankles to reveal a pair of strappy black stilettos

She showed off a host of golden necklaces, with one Jesus Is King charm perched across her neck, an ode to her husband Kanye West's latest venture.

The mother-of-three told her 150million followers on Instagram that her shapewear was a necessary addition to her chic look for the day as she took a video from The Mercer hotel.

Kim said that she's 'wearing extra bonded to the knee SKIMS today. 'I really just feel like I needed that extra snatch; I feel extra bloated.'

Stylish: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wore her chocolate brown hair straight past her shoulders with a distinct part down the middle

Whatever it takes: The mother-of-three told her 150million followers on Instagram that her shapewear was a necessary addition to her chic look for the day as she took a video from The Mercer hotel

Family first: She showed off a host of golden necklaces, with one Jesus Is King charm perched across her neck, an ode to her husband Kanye West's latest venture

It was off across town for the makeup connoisseur as she enlisted the help of her favorite artist, Mario Dedivanovic, to surprise a few fans at Ulta.

'Maybe we'll give you guys some makeovers,' she shared on Instagram. 'So whoever wants a makeover, come to Ulta. Mario will be waiting for you. 3rd and 86th ... so if you want, you can also go to his house after.'

A few lucky fans got the chance to chat with the pair before Kim found a brush and palette set to help apply.

Kim's set to add even more pieces with her Contour Bonded collection later this week after launching her SKIMS line in September.

Smart shoppers: It was off across town for the makeup connoisseur as she enlisted the help of her favorite artist, Mario Dedivanovic, to surprise a few fans at Ulta

'Maybe we'll give you guys some makeovers,' she shared on Instagram. 'So whoever wants a makeover, come to Ulta'
description: The 39-year-old nearly spilled out of the top of her black satin dress as she made her way to an Ulta beauty store in Manhattan.
